1010110100100001 1010100110000101 0 -> sum: 0101011010100110, cout: 1

0111111000110100 1101110110111100 1 -> sum: 0101101111110001, cout: 1

0111101001110011 1100010110010000 1 -> sum: 0100000000000100, cout: 1
1000000110011000 0010101000010111 1 -> sum: 1010101110110000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
